offer_id.description: the id of this offer (merkle hash of non-signature fields)

active.description: whether this can still be used

single_use.description: whether this expires as soon as it's paid (reflects the *single_use* parameter)

bolt12.description: the bolt12 encoding of the offer

bolt12_unsigned.description: the bolt12 encoding of the offer, without a signature

used.description: True if an associated invoice has been paid

created.description: false if the offer already existed
